text: @ShashiTharoor @AmitShah Iske liya bolte han desh mein padhai karo. Naukri chahe foreign karo toh b chlega. Amit ji is saying that when Congress is doing politics on the coronavirus case what is congress doing for the welfare of the society? What's their status where congress is in power. ?
